page.title: 05LIFESTYLES GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: The monkey grip is very popular.One person is it. He tries to catch other people who when they are touched form a chain until all the children have been touched. Stuck in the mud is when a person is it and has to chase other people those he touches have to stand still with their arms outstretched so that people can free you from the mud.If you are caught three times you become it. British bulldog is a game in which children all have to cross the playground avoiding the child that is it. You need three or more people to play budge one to catch people and the others to stand in squares or circles.When the catcher shouts budge the others have to move to another square or circle without getting caught.
